passive.name: Blazing Spirit
passive.description:
Attacks inflict Burn equal to 20% of this unit's damage over 4 seconds.
Burn damage increases by 0.5% per wave (up to +10%).

passive.name: Weakened State
passive.description: Attacks inflict a Physical Debuff that makes enemies take 15% more damage from Physical Type units for 10 seconds (does not stack).

passive.name: Disorder
passive.description:
After every attack, Akuzo strikes the strongest enemy in range, dealing 25% of this units damage.
If the target is Burning, this attack deals 100% bonus damage.
This attack does not inflict Burn.

ability.name: Final Clash
ability.description:
While this ability is active, Akuzo and Renkuro unleash their true power, granting the following bonuses for 30 seconds:
- +33.3% Damage
- Burn duration doubled
- Disorder damage doubled

passive.name: Crimson Immortality
passive.description:
Attacks inflict bleed for 3 seconds, dealing 30% of this unit's damage over time.
Every time Dracula kills an enemy, he absorbs their blood, gaining +2.5% Damage and -1% Cooldown every 25 kills (max +25% Damage and -10% Cooldown).

passive.name: Blood Thirsty
passive.description: Every enemy in Dracula's range takes 10% more damage from attacks.

ability.name: Release Restraint Level Zero
ability.description:
While active, Dracula releases his restraints, unleashing Level Zero for 30 seconds, gaining:
+50% Damage
-20% Cooldown
While this ability is active, every enemy Dracula kills summons a Hound from the base (max 13).
While a Hound is alive, Dracula's Cooldown is reduced by 10%.

passive.name: Uncontrolled Power
passive.description: Every 10 attacks, Brulo unleashes a Rage Burst, dealing +200% damage with +50% range.

passive.name: Limitless Rage
passive.description: Brulo gains +0.5% damage for every enemy inside his range (up to 15%).

passive.name: Loyal Blade
passive.description:
When Sun Woo is on the field, Igrith deals +15% bonus damage.
For every Shadow currently summoned, Igrith gains -5% Cooldown. (Capped at 3 Summons)

passive.name: Knight's Roar
passive.description:
Whenever Sun Woo gets a kill within Igrith's range, Igrith unleashes a battle cry, granting +10% damage and +10% attack speed to all nearby allies for 5 seconds.
If 3 or more kills occur this way within 10 seconds, the buff's duration is doubled.

passive.name: Shadow of Myself
passive.description:
Each attack spawns an additional Clone that attacks enemies with 30% of Kurimi's Damage, using her current move. These Clones can hit Flying Enemies and each Clone lasts 20 seconds (a maximum of 3 Clones can exist at a time).
After Zaphkiel's Clockwork is activated, all active Clones instantly attack the strongest enemy in range with 50% of Kurimi's damage.

passive.name: Time Fracture
passive.description:
For every 5 seconds spent on the field, Kurimi's Damage increases by 5% (max +30%).
During Zaphkiel's Clockwork, this passive's damage buff is doubled.
After Zaphkiel's Clockwork ends, this passive's damage buff resets to 0%.

ability.name: Zaphkiel's Clockwork
ability.description:
Applies Timestop to all enemies in range for 10 seconds.
After the Timestop ends, all enemies affected by Timestop take 100% of Kurimi's Damage.
(90 seconds Global Cooldown Per Player)
Each time Kurimi kills an enemy, Zaphkiel's Clockwork's cooldown is permanently reduced by 0.25 seconds (max -60 seconds).

passive.name: Seven Faces
passive.description: If Nagu Disguises as 5 different units in a single match, he permanently gains +25% Critical Chance.

passive.name: Deceptive Criticals
passive.description: Nagu gains +25% Critical Chance and +50% Critical Damage

passive.name: Doppelganger's Trick
passive.description:
Nagu can Disguise as a selected unit for 30 seconds.
He copies the target's current move, 5-50% of their Damage (Scales up based on Nagu's upgrade level), and 100% of their SPA.
Cannot copy Farm, Buff, or Summoner units.
Must disguise as a different unit before reusing the same Disguise.
While Disguised, each of Nagu's attacks increases his Damage by +25% (up to 100%). Resets when the Disguise ends.
Breaking the Disguise early inflicts -10% Damage for 15s.
Nagu doesn't copy Traits, Passives, Levels, or Stat Potentials but instead uses his own.

ability.name: Disguise
ability.description: Copies a selected unit's move, 5-50% of their Damage (Scales up based on Nagu's upgrade level), and 100% of their SPA.

passive.name: Secondhand Energy
passive.description: Reijin gaing +2% Damage for every Magic Type unit in range. (up to +20%)

passive.name: When It Matters
passive.description: Deals 25% more damage to bosses.

ability.name: 1000% Gratitude
ability.description: After activation, Reijin's next attack deals 1000% Damage.

passive.name: Each attack has a 22.5% chance to make the next attack deal +200% damage.
Shadow Extraction
passive.description: When this unit gets a takedown, there is a 15% chance to extract a Shadow. A maximum of 2 Shadows can exist at a time. If the cap is reached, additional Shadows will not spawn until one disappears.

passive.name: Monarch's Will
passive.description:
For each active Shadow, Sun Woo gains:
+7.5% Damage
-5% SPA
(Capped at 2 Summons)

ability.name: System: Arise
ability.description: Summons 1 Elite Shadow that mirrors 150% of Sun Woo's current stats. The Elite Shadow lasts for 60 seconds.

passive.name: Flashy Duelist
passive.description:
Whenever an enemy dies within Tengin's range, he gains +10% Critical Chance (cannot stack).
This bonus lasts until a Critical Hit occurs.
If Tengin attacks without landing a Critical Hit, he gains +20% Critical Chance per hit until he crits.

passive.name: Explosive Precision
passive.description: On Critical Hit, Tengin throws 2 Explosion Marble's that deal 25% damage in a small circle AoE.

passive.name: The Flashy God
passive.description:
Each attack has a 33% chance to throw 1 Explosion Marble at a random enemy in range that deals 25% damage in a small circle AoE.
When this triggers, Tengin's Cooldown reduces by 2% (up to -20%).
If this effect fails to trigger for 3 consecutive attacks, he instead throws 4 Explosion Marble's at random enemies in range that deal 25% damage in a small circle AoE.

passive.name: Fullmetal Resonance
passive.description:
Alfonz gains +33% Damage, +10% Range, and -5 SPA.
 If Alfonz doesn't stop attacking for 15 seconds, he gains +25% Damage and +15% Range for 10 seconds.

passive.name: Gentle Titan
passive.description: Every 10 seconds Alfonz smashed to ground dealing 50% of his damage and applies a random debuff.

passive.name: Created to Be King
passive.description: If neither Igrith nor Sun Woo is withing Ant King's range, Ant King gains +15% Damage and +7.5% SPA.

passive.name: Instinctive Precision
passive.description:
Ant Kign gains +25% Critical Chance permanently upon placement.
Every time Ant King attacks, he has a 30% chance to gain +10% Critical Chance as a bonus.
This bonus resets after 8 seconds.

passive.name: Royal Venom
passive.description: Ant King's attacks inflict Poison on hit, dealing 15% of his damage over 5 seconds.

passive.name: Soul Drain
passive.description: Bones gains +0.1% Damage per kill (+50% max).

passive.name: Encore
passive.description:
Every attack increases Bones' Damage by +5%.
After reaching +25%, his next attack inflicts Burn for 5 seconds, dealing 50% of this units damage over time.
This attack resets the bonus damage to 0%.

passive.name: Final Movement
passive.description:
After Bones reaches max kills from Soul Drain, every 60 seconds he enters Final Movement.
During Final Movement, Bones gains +100% Critical Chance, his cooldown reduces by 20% and emits a musical aura that reduces nearby allies Cooldown by 20% for 30 seconds.

passive.name: Absorption
passive.description:
When an enemy dies within this unit's range, Boo gains +5% damage for 10 seconds (up to +50%).
If the enemy is a Boss, gain +50% damage instead (ignores the cap).
Also gains +50% damage when a Boss evolves within range (ignores the cap).

passive.name: Absorption Mix
passive.description:
Boo absorbs in a special bar by killing enemies.
Once the bar reaches 50,

passive.name: Eternal Blazy
passive.description: Attacks inflict Burn equal to 30% of this unit's damage over 3 seconds.

passive.name: Scorching Momentum
passive.description: If the enemy is already Burning, attacks deal an additional 30% damage.

passive.name: Frostfire Surge
passive.description: When attacking an enemy that is currently Frozen, the hit deals +150% bonus damage.

passive.name: Calculated Dominance
passive.description:
The first attack against each enemy deals -30% Damage.
All attacks after that deals +30% Damage.

passive.name: Crushing Authority
passive.description:
While this unit is on the field, all units in range lose 10% Damage (cannot stack).
Gains +50% Damage.

passive.name: Shatterpoint
passive.description: Claw's attacks ignore enemy shields.

passive.name: Crimson Threads
passive.description: Attacks inflict Bleed for 4 seconds, dealing 40% of this unit's damage over time.

passive.name: Elegant Execution
passive.description:
When an enemy dies while affected by Bleed within her range, Daume gains +5% Damage and +5% Range for 10s.
Stacks up to 3 times.

passive.name: Cruel Authority
passive.description: If more than 15 enemies are within her range, Daume's Damage is increased by 40%.

passive.name: Steel Brotherhood
passive.description:
Edwao gains +10% Range and +10% Damage.
If Alfonz is within this unit's range, Edwao gains an extra +20% Damage.

passive.name: Alchemic Genius
passive.description: For every 20 seconds spent on the field, Edwao's Damage increases by +2% and his Cooldown decreases by -1% (up to +20% Damage and -10% SPA).

passive.name: Sleep Strike
passive.description:
Every attack applies Sleep for 2 seconds. (Each enemy has a 10 second cooldown before they can be applied Sleep again.)
Enemies affected by Sleep take +20% damage from Enmo's attacks.

passive.name: Sleep Deprivation
passive.description: Enemies that die while affected by Sleep boosts Enmo's damage by 1% (max 15%) lasting 4 seconds.

passive.name: High Voltage
passive.description:
Enol builds 1 charge with every attack (max of 10 charges).
Upon reaching 10 charges Enol enters an Overcharged state for 40 seconds.
He gains +50% damage, +10% attack speed, and +15% range.
After Overcharged ends the charges reset to 0 and they cannot be regenerated for 30 seconds.

passive.name: God's Punishment
passive.description:
Enol deals +20% bonus damage to enemies under control effects (stun, freeze, slow, etc).
If an enemy dies while under any control effect, Enol's Cooldown reduces by 3% (up to 12% max).

passive.name: Weight Of Power
passive.description:
With each attack, Fat Hitman burns away his fatigue.
After 25 attacks, transforms into Half-Slim Form:
+50% Damage
-10% Cooldown
After 50 attacks, transforms into Slim Form:
+100% Damage
-20% Cooldown

passive.name: Hidden Assassin
passive.description:
After each attack, Fat Hitman has a 10% chance to attack again.
If this attack kills an enemy, his next attack deals +10% damage.

passive.name: Curse's Commander
passive.description:
If 6 or more curses are on the field, Getu gains a +10% health boost.
Additionally, each time a summoned curse kills an enemy, Getu gains +0.1% health boost stacking up to a maximum of +10%.

passive.name: Tidal Reflex
passive.description: If an enemy has entered Giu's range within the last 5 seconds, Giu's next attack deals +20% Damage against that enemy.

passive.name: Tide of Strikes
passive.description: Each time Giu kills an enemy while Flowing Calm is active, he gains +20% Damage for 20 seconds (refreshes with each kill) and +10% chance to immediately attack the strongest enemy using a random skill of his own.

ability.name: Flowing Calm
ability.description:
For 10 seconds, Giu enters a state of perfect focus, emitting a steady pulse every second that:
- Slows enemies by 50% for 2.9 seconds (5.9 Second Cooldown)
- Deals 10% of Giu's damage
- Hits flying enemies

ability.name: Unlimited Void
ability.description: Freezes all enemies on the map for 8.5 seconds.

passive.name: Saiyan Precision
passive.description: Goko deals +35% damage against flying enemies.

passive.name: Kame Impact
passive.description: Every 5 attacks, Goko charges a powered strike that deals +50% bonus damage.

passive.name: Primal Power
passive.description: For every 10 enemies defeated, Goko gains +5% damage and +3% crit chance (max +25% damage, +15% crit).

passive.name: Divine Strike
passive.description: Whenever an enemy enters Golden Spirit's range, they take damage equal to 50% of this unit's damage (once per enemy).

passive.name: Golden Judgement
passive.description: For each second an enemy remains within Golden Spirit' s range, he deals an extra 2.5% Damage to that enemy when he attacks (up to +25%).

passive.name: Radiant Focus
passive.description:
Every 30 seconds, Haein marks a random enemy on the map.
She deals +40% damage to marked enemies.

passive.name: Reflected Grace
passive.description: Every 5th attack, Haein deals +180% damage.

passive.name: Sharp-Eyed Scout
passive.description: Every 50 seconds, Heisou's bird grants him +10% Damage and +1000% Range for 15 seconds.

passive.name: Rhythm Flow
passive.description: Every time he attacks, he gains +5% damage boost ( capped at 20%) that last 10s but the duration gets reset to 10s everytime it attacks again.

passive.name: Deadliest Sniper
passive.description: Heisou has 15% Chance to crit the enemy. He always crits the 5th attack.

passive.name: Demonic Precision
passive.description: If Hie attacks the same target three times in a row, the third hit is guaranteed to critical.

passive.name: Cold-Blooded Focus
passive.description:
Hie deals +30% damage to enemies below 50% HP.
Killing one grants -5% Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

passive.name: Soul Bind
passive.description:
Each attack applies 1 Soul Bind stack to the target (max 3 stacks).
Upon reaching 3 stacks, Ichi's next strike detonates them, dealing true damage equal to 175% of Ichi's damage.
Detonation only occurs once per target per full stack cycle.

passive.name: Hollow Fury
passive.description:
Detonating Soul Bind activates Hollow Fury for 8 seconds.
While active, Ichi gains:
+20% Attack Speed
+10% Critical Chance
Each kill during Hollow Fury extends its duration by 2 seconds, up to a maximum of 12 seconds total.

passive.name: Extraterrestrial Strength
passive.description: Jiro gains +1% Damage for every unit in range.

passive.name: Rivalry
passive.description: When Goko is within this unit's range, Jiro gains +25% Damage.

passive.name: King Reborn
passive.description:
Every 25 seconds, King enters Ascended State for 8 seconds:
+40% Damage
-20% Cooldown
+15% Range

passive.name: Emberheart
passive.description:
Attacks inflict Burn for 4 seconds, dealing 35% of this unit's damage over time.
If the enemy is affected by Freeze, deals 50% more Burn damage.

passive.name: Psychic Aura
passive.description:
Enemies within Psycho's range are constantly afflicted by Psychic Aura, taking 1% of his damage every second.
If an enemy dies from this effect, Psycho permanently gains +1% Damage and +0.5% Range, up to a maximum of +15% Damage and +7.5% Range.
While ???% is active, Psychic Aura deals 2% damage per second instead.

passive.name: Emotional Spectrum
passive.description:
Psycho has an Emotion Meter. This meter goes up by 0. 5% every time Psycho kills an enemy (max 100%).
When the Emotion Meter reaches 100%, use ???% Ability to choose an emotion that will consume Psycho.
Anger: Psycho gains +50% Damage.
Sadness: Psycho's attacks can hit Flying Enemies.
Friendship: Psycho buffs Damage of all units by 20% (cannot stack with another Psycho).

ability.description:
After activating for the first time, the Emotion Meter transforms into ??? Meter.
This ability can be toggled on and off at any time. When Inactive:
The Meter fills by 2.5% every second (max 200%).
When Active:
Psycho's cooldown gets reduced by 50%.
The Meter drains by 5% every second.
Psycho gains +20% Range while the ??? Meter is at 200%.

passive.name: Demonic Nobility
passive.description: All Fire Element units in range gain +10% Damage and +15% Range.

passive.name: Hellfire Elegance
passive.description:
Attacks inflict Burn for 4 seconds, dealing 40% of this unit's damage over time.
Ries gains +15% Damage if there is a Fire Element unit within her range.

passive.name: Snip Snip!
passive.description:
Rio's attacks apply 1 stack to enemies hit.
At 5 stacks, the enemy instantly loses 10% of their Current Health.
Each enemy has a 10 second cooldown before another stack can be applied.

passive.name: Haircut!
passive.description:
Every 20 seconds, Rio gives a random ally within range a Haircut, granting +30% Damage and +15% Range for 10 seconds. (cannot stack)
Cannot give Haircut to farm or buff units.

passive.name: Divine Duelist
passive.description: Each consecutive attack against the same enemy deals +5% More Damage (max +50%).

passive.name: Silent Execution
passive.description:
Ryoma's attacks have a 25% chance to instantly execute non-boss enemies below 10% HP.
Each successful execution reduces his Cooldown by -2% (max -15%).

passive.name: Dizzy Flow
passive.description:
Each attack grants 1 Drink Stack (max 10 stacks).
At 3-10 stacks, she can consume her drink to become Dizzy.
Each stack grants 2.5 seconds of Dizzy Mode.
Consuming the maximum 10 stacks grants an additional +50% Dizzy Mode duration.

passive.name: Dizzy Mode
passive.description:
While dizzy she:
Cannot gain Drink Stack.
Gains +100% Damage and -25% Attack Speed
Each hit has a 10% chance to not deal any damage.
After Dizzy Mode ends:
Reset Drink Stacks to 0.
-15% Damage and -10% Range for 15 seconds.

passive.name: Deadly Rhythm
passive.description:
Every third attack is a critical strike.
If this critical strike kills an enemy.
Shunks gains -10% Attack Speed for 10 seconds (stacks up to 20% attack speed reduction).

passive.name: Conqueror's Pressure
passive.description:
The lower an enemy's Health is, the stronger Shunks becomes:
Below 70% HP  Deals +10% damage to that enemy
Below 40% HP  Gains +20% Crit Chance against that enemy.

passive.name: Conqueror's Will
passive.description: Attacks apply Stun to enemies for 3 seconds. Each enemy has a 15-second cooldown before they can be applied Stun again.

passive.name: Predator
passive.description:
Every minute and a half Slime devours the enemy dealing 250% damage.
If an enemy is killed with this attack Slime gains +5% damage for 10 seconds.
This damage bonus stacks up to 3 times.

passive.name: Arcane Focus
passive.description: If she doesn't attack for 12 seconds, her next attack deals +40% Damage and gains +15% Range.

passive.name: Witches' Snare
passive.description: Sweet Witch curses nearby enemies for 10 seconds, casting a 7% Magical Debuff on them.

passive.name: Harmonic Flow
passive.description: When Giu is within this unit's range, Tanjuru gains +10% Damage and -7.5% Cooldown.

passive.name: Clear Strike
passive.description: After every 15 seconds, Tanjuru's next attack deals 200% Damage as True Damage.

passive.name: Burning Resolve
passive.description:
For every 5 enemies defeated within his range, Tanjuru gains +25% Damage for 8 seconds. (cannot stack)
If he defeats 10 enemies within 15 seconds, he enters Sunfire Rage, reducing his Cooldown by 25% for 15 seconds.

passive.name: Unnatural Precision!
passive.description: Attacks inflict Bleed equal to 30% of this unit's damage over 3 seconds.

passive.name: One Shot!
passive.description: Every shot fired by Toju has an additional 2.5% critical chance and 100% critical damage.

passive.name: Cursed Null!
passive.description: Each enemy attack by this unit has a 2.5% chance to deal 100% True Damage.

passive.name: Rejected Killer!
passive.description: Each time Toju attacks the same enemy, the enemy takes +2% more damage from him (up to +20%).

passive.name: Harmonic Flow
passive.description: When Giu is within this unit's range, Tanjuru gains +10% Damage and -7% Cooldown.

passive.name: Frozen Grace
passive.description: Attacks apply Freeze to enemies for 1 second.
